explanation: [0-0] Inside a room, a short-haired man wearing a tie-dye short-sleeved shirt is sitting behind a white table with paint stains on it. A mobile phone is standing on a yellow towel on the table. He leans on the table with his right arm, holding a red object in his hand, looking at the phone. On the phone screen is his reflection, with a white number "7" in the center. Behind him, the wall is decorated with geometric shapes in red and green.

[0-7] Then he looks to the left, squeezing his right hand. Red liquid drips from his hand onto the table. He looks forward, eyes wide with surprise, then transfers the object in his right hand to his left and places it on the table. As he squeezes the red object, the numbers on the phone screen count down. When the countdown ends, he picks up the yellow towel on the table and wipes the red liquid off his arm, then raises both hands and looks at the phone. The phone screen keeps changing, showing his movements and expressions.
